name: Taxi!
description:
Taxi! is an action/simulation game in which the main goal is to collect, carry and drop the passengers at the many stops and different places present on the screen. As in a real taxi service, the transporting of passengers get you a fee.

In addition, how long you spend driving affects your payment, much like more contemporary games like Crazy Taxi.

The game has fixed locations, each one of them having one or two taxi stops, namely: Hotel; Petrol (for refuelling); Central Station (divided by the upper and lower stops) and Theatre. The stop Rank refers to the location of the starting point and indicates the number of cars the player still has in possession.

shot.caption:
Starting Point:
You start the game at the Taxi park with 2 more cars in your possession.

The First Customer:
Here is the first one waiting at the Stop located in the superior part of "Central Station". A "For Hire" indication is also informing that.

Car Accident:
The taxi as much as all the traffic, drives in circles making the curves very tight.

Picking a customer:
There are not many chances to pick a customer, the driving has to be impeccable avoiding unnecessary turns as waste of fuel.

Dropping a customer:
Now we have to drop him in the "Theatre".

A Tip for your services:
Depending on the quickness of your services you will be much or less rewarded.

Chaotic traffic:
As long as you endure, the amount of traffic will also increase.
Lets pick this one at the "Hotel", shall we?
